sentence.text: protein autophosphorylation is expressed in cochlear hair cells and retinal cells and is responsible for human recessive hereditary nonsyndromic deafness (protein autophosphorylation).
To investigate the mechanism of protein autophosphorylation-type deafness, we established a mouse model of Myo3a kinase domain Y137C mutation by using CRISPR/Cas9 system.
This mouse line is an excellent model for studying protein autophosphorylation-type deafness in humans
To investigate the mechanism of DFNB30-type deafness, we established a mouse model of protein autophosphorylation kinase domain Y137C mutation by using CRISPR/Cas9 system.
